import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Card, Row, Col, InputGroup, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const MovieOne = ({ data }) => { const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]) const title = data.list[0].page.title const contentitems = data.list[0].page["content-items"] const content = contentitems['content']; setMovies(content); console.log(content) return (

{title}
{content.map((items, index) => { return ( {items.name} ) })}
) } export default MovieOne
